product_name: BiodermaSebium H2O Micellar Water Face Cleanser for Combination to Oily Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganBioderma Sébium H2O Micellar Water Face Cleanser for Combination to Oily Skin cleanses impurities without drying out the skin and removes excess sebum.
details: DetailsBenefitsPurifies and gently cleanses the skin without drying it out and removes excess sebum.Effectively removes dirt and makeup from the face with unique micellar technology.95% of volunteers found their skin purified (7-day study on 20 volunteers).Ideal for combination to oily skin.Non-comedogenic.No-rinse formula.Key IngredientsFormulated with Zinc Gluconate and Copper Sulfate to purify and remove excess sebum.D.A.F. Complex to enhance skin tolerance.Micellar Technology to gently capture impurities and makeup, while preserving the skin's natural balance and soothing sensitive skin.Formulated WithoutAlcoholParabensItem 2636042How To UseUse as a daily cleanser and makeup remover to gently purify and balance the skin. Apply morning and/or evening by soaking a cotton pad with Sébium H2O Micellar Water. Gently cleanse and remove makeup from the face. No rinsing required.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Peg-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Sodium Citrate, Zinc Gluconate, Copper Sulfate, Ginkgo Bilobaleaf Extract, Mannitol, Xylitol, Rhamnose, Fructooligosaccharides, Propylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Cetrimoniumbromide, Fragrance (Parfum).
how_to_use: Use as a daily cleanser and makeup remover to gently purify and balance the skin. Apply morning and/or evening by soaking a cotton pad with Sébium H2O Micellar Water. Gently cleanse and remove makeup from the face. No rinsing required.
